Beautiful dress, material and fit. I wore a 2x a little big but it was comfortable.
I’m 5’8” 170, my bust is large and was not flattering as I expected.  Will be returning
I really liked this dress. I’m 5’2, 135lbs. I have a hard time finding dresses because I’m big chested 34DDD. This dress has plenty of room up top. I bought a small and there was plenty coverage.

The length and cut are appropriate for work dress code, and the navy color is true to pictures. This dress is really comfy and flattering for body types with bigger beats. The fabric is lightweight both the sheer overlay and the inner lining. The sleeves are a big billowy so be careful when reaching for the appetizers ;) it's a good value for under $50. I do need to use a garment steamer on the dress to release any wrinkles.
This dress fits perfectly for me. I wore it for the 2023 regional convention and it feels comfortable.

This fit perfect! Not too big or too small. I was torn between a small or a medium, but I went by previous reviews and ended up getting a small. I wore this to a formal work event for my husband's job. It was classy and perfect! Highly recommended this dress.

I was so happy with this dress at a recent wedding! I was hesitation due to some negative reviews and confusing sizing, however, I'm so happy I went with it! Beautiful material, lightweight and uniformed color. I got so many compliments and I was comfortable all night long. The sizes do run bigger than expected, I wish I would've sized down because I did need to pin it in a few places.

Was not satisfied with color, but waited for to see if I could find another. I am a fantastic customer and I would really like to send this dress back and order something else!!

Too small even though i bought in my size. Fabric seemed cheap as well.
I like the style and but it was a little short for a tall person but it's wearable it's a keeper

This was supposed to be an after baptism gift to my sister for her to wear to the reception later that day, but in the morning when she opened the gift, it had a black sharpie mark right in the middle of the chest. It was so disappointing and I really wish I checked it before giving it to her.  She promised that she would try to sew it into something else but honestly for the price I wish that I had noticed it first so that I could get her something else because Lord knows those sewing projects pile up and we end up just giving them the Goodwill or throwing them away. That is way too much for any mistakes.
Bought this dress for a charity luncheon.  Beautiful material, drapes well, nice length & I received many compliments.
This dress was 100% polyester. There’s no way that there was one piece of cotton sewn into this dress. Also, the wrists on the sleeves are just elastic. Was very tacky looking.

Good delivery and packaging. Love my blue midi  chiffon dress!  Well made. I purchased the medium(135 lbs) overall fit is good but the  bust area (40-C) bunched up a bit so I removed the clasp and all is comfortable. Feminine ,flowy and classy dress.

I got the white and pink because I couldn’t decide and later got the green in the same month! If you see a closet staple get it because they will last long. Pretty Garden is my go to store for jackets for years  so I can count on them carrying quality clothing.

The sizing was very accurate! I suggest that if you're taller you size up, or the sleeves will almost be too short. The elastic around the wrists felt cheap and scratchy. The fabric was also of lower quality and noisy, especially the lining to the skirt. However the color is pretty accurate compared to the picture (though appearance of the color varies from screen to screen). There is, however, a little snap at the neckline of the dress to keep the girls mostly hidden. I'm sure this would be a different for larger bust measurements. Overall, the dress was just a bad experience.

I ordered 2 different colors 2 different sizes. The pink was a little paler than I wanted so I will be returning them. I think whatever size you order you may have to alter something. On the size Large the snaps in the breast area are not placed in the right spot so you will have to move them. I had to use safety pins as well as double sided tape to keep it together. On the X-Large the sleeves were humongous and too long. Also no matter what I did I could not get the wrinkles out of the pleated area so I had to take it to the cleaners. To me the pleats need to be a little more defined, but overall I chose the turquoise and  received plenty of compliments.
